summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Vitabrid C12 Vitamin C face brightening powder - 12hours Transdermal, the Best professional Vitamin C complex and LDH help brighten and minimize fine lines/wrinkles through collagen synthesis Review Date: 2016/12/24 Store: LUBEX Product Description: ['State-of-the art 12-hour Transdermal Vitamin C powder for your face! Transdermal vitamin C powder for anti-aging and skin rejuvenation. Highly potent Vitamin C complex helps brighten, and minimize fine lines and wrinkles through collagen synthesis, making your skin bright, nourished and glowing with natural radiance.'] Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Vitabrid', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Skin Type': 'Combination', 'Product Benefits': 'Brightening', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5.1 x 2.6 x 1.5 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Hyundai IBT Co., Ltd'} Review Text: This is perhaps one of the most difficult reviews that I have written in a while. Usually I know immediately if the product is a hit or miss, but Vitabrid C12 is different. I can’t decide. I’m torn. After using VC12 for about 3 weeks, I am still unsure of the results.

The concept: Vitamin C is slow released thru the skin by mixing a small amount of VC12, with water or a moisturizer, onto the face and neck. The results, brighter, smoother and firmer skin. The powder comes in a convenient small bottle (about the length of your thumb) with a small spoon (used for measuring). Simply mix the appropriate amount - I use about 2 spoonfuls since I put it on my face and neck- with a lightweight moisturizer. I didn’t notice any tightness, irritation or itching after I applied this to my skin (i.e., face and neck). I simply apply my makeup as usual. With that being said, I haven’t noticed anything bad either -no additional breakouts and no nasty white film (left on my face from bad blending). But I also haven’t looked in the mirror and said “wow” or “gosh, this is like a facelift in a bottle moment”. Not to mention that this product takes a little more effort than my usual skincare regime. I am not use to mixing products before I use them. **Therefore, I am going to give this product 3 stars BUT continue to use it for a little longer to see if I am wowed. After all each container is believed to last about 3 months. If I notice something earth shattering in the next month or so, I will amend my review. Otherwise, this review will stand. Review Title: Undecided still. Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Black Mask Peel Off Mask Purifying Blackhead Remover Mask Deep Pore Cleansing Activated Charcoal Mask for Face Nose, Acne Treatment Oil Control Review Date: 2017/03/06 Store: Reve Beauty Product Description: ["Specifications: Mask Color: Black Gender: Unisex Type: Remove blackhead mask Fit for: All types of skin. The mask is NOT recommended for sensitive skin or those prone to skin irritations. Net Wet: 60g Shelf life:3 years Usage Method: 1. Use clean facial skin cleanser, and then with towel hot compress 3-5 minutes, wait for the pores opening. 2.Apply evenly on nose, face, frontal and chin etc. 3.Wait for 15-20 minutes, from top to down, and gently torn off. 4.Finally, please use the warm water to wipe clean. and then put some moisturizing Essence to your face. Tips for best result: 1. Suggest to use on T-zone, nose, and chin area first, if you feel the pain is OK, then try to whole face. 2. The thickness needs to be appropriate. If coating thickness is too thin,it is not easy to peel the mask on the whole piece and adsorption effect is not obvious . If it is too thick ,waiting time would be too long ,it is recommended to use daub amount to cover the skin. 3.Mild blackheads: once a week; Moderate blackhead: twice a week; Severe blackheads: 2-3 times a week. Please Pay Attention to: 1.Don't put a thick layer. Put just suitable enough. otherwise, you will feel painful when peeling off it. 2.Keep the mask mud away from your hair. 3.When mask is dry. from top to down, and gently torn off, not very quickly. 4.Apply a amount of the product at the back of the hand or ear, if no allergic reactions(itching, redness) within 5 minutes before using.If there is any discomfort, stop using. 5.For external use only. Avoid directly contact with eyes, brow and lips, if this occurs rinse well with lukewarm water at once. If you have any problems. Please contact us at any time. We look forward to serving you."] Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.25 x 10.08 x 3.3 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1', 'UPC': '721352051693 721352069162 721352059101', 'Manufacturer': 'Lantique'} Review Text: Ordered this for my son and he really loves it. He finds that this kit is helpful because there are a variety of tools that address most skin issues. He also likes there is a kit that holds all of the tools which means that he can keep them together and doesn't have to look for them when needed. And finally, this kit was affordable and even more reasonable than some that I have seen in several discount stores. Review Title: Just what he needed. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: LaClaire Acne Wash with Salicylic Acid & Tea Tree Oil - Face Cleanser for Acne-Prone Skin (50 ml/1.65 oz) Review Date: 2018/09/01 Store: LaClaire Average Rating: 3.0 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Oil, Foam', 'Skin Type': 'Oily, Combination, Dry, Normal', 'Brand': 'LaClaire', 'Scent': 'Tea Tree', 'Material Feature': 'Antibacterial', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5.5 x 2.75 x 1.63 inches; 9.14 Ounces', 'UPC': '891040000705', 'Manufacturer': 'LaClaire'} Review Text: LaClaire (Beverly Hills) Clarifying Cleanser is a delight on the skin. Simply add a dime sized amount, with a little water and distribute on your face with your hands (or if you prefer a loofah). The small (1.6 ounce) pump bottle is simple to use and doesn’t take up too much space in the cabinet or on the counter. There are some pretty nice ingredients that include tea tree oil, salicylic acid and aloe. I’ve used the product for a few days now and have not noticed any dryness or irritation. Nor have I noticed any redness or rashes. The scent of the cleanser is not strong (smells like tea tree oil) and does not linger long. And finally, what I like the most? This company has made a product in a bottle that is reusable. I really like companies who have a philosophy to reduce their impact on the world. Being socially aware of how their products can affect the environment and actively doing something about it is a company that I can support. You can reuse the bottle and add liquid soap or other things. Review Title: Leaves your skin feeling cool and refreshed. Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Fuller Brush Styling Professional Hairbrush - Everyday Hair Styling Tool - Combination Boar and Nylon Bristles Gently Brush Hair while Styling Smoothing and Removing Tangles Dirt Flakes and Oil Review Date: 2020/01/17 Store: Fuller Brush Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Fuller Brush', 'Shape': 'Rectangular', 'Handle Material': 'Plastic', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothing', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '8.98 x 2.6 x 1.81 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '083701005291'} Review Text: Clearly Amazon has mis-priced this brush. $50, for a plastic handled brush and firm bristles? First, I am ok with the plastic handle. It is easy to grip and hold. And since it is plastic, you don’t have to worry about it looking faded after several washes (I do clean mine) like you do with the wooden ones. I’m even ok with the firm bristles (nylon and boar), because I have coarse hair and I’m not tender headed. I like that it smooths the hair easily. What I don’t like is the PRICE. I can’t believe they expect people to pay $49 for this brush. Yikes! And the sad thing is that it didn’t even come in pretty packaging. Just in a simple white box. So, while I am sure I will use this brush, I can’t get over the price. 2 stars Review Title: $50 for a plastic brush? Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: ikoo Deep Caring Hair Mask, Hydrate & Shine, Great for Normal, Dry or Lackluster Hair, All Natural Ingredients, Effectively Hydrates, Moisturizes & Adds Shine - 6.8 Fl Oz Review Date: 2021/07/07 Store: ikoo Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Ikoo', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Material Feature': 'Natural, Cruelty Free, Vegan', 'Hair Type': 'Dry,Normal', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.74 x 3.74 x 3.15 inches; 11.68 Ounces'} Review Text: The Ikoo Infusions hair mask was surprisingly great. It is moisturizing, hydrating and nourishing. This product comes in a round (6.8 oz) container. The thick (light green) cream smells refreshing and bright. Some of the ingredients are macadamia oil, honey extract and camellia oil. It is non-greasy but does leave a slight shine. This product is cruelty, vegan, sulfate and paraffin free (Peta approved since that is important for some consumers). I have coarse, sometimes dry hair, that after using this product made it more manageable after just one treatment. I used it as a deep conditioning treatment. It left my scalp and hair feeling refreshed and clean. I’d recommend it. Review Title: Moisturizing and hydrating. Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Fragrantshare Makeup Brush Set 18pcs Travel Makeup Brushes [Horse Hair Hand Brush] with Blush, Eye Shadow, Eye Liner, Highlighter, Eyebrow, Eyelash, Foundation Brush - Black Review Date: 2021/07/17 Store: FragrantShare Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'FragrantShare', 'Color': 'Black', 'Material': 'Animal Hair', 'Item Form': 'Wand', 'Number of Pieces': '18', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Ferrule Material': 'Aluminum', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '10 x 7 x 1.7 inches; 11.22 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'PRO-18', 'UPC': '633690926659'} Review Text: I like that this set (Fragrantshare) contains a variety of (make-up) brushes. You get 18 brushes in different shapes and sizes. You get everything from a foundation brush, to one that you can apply eyeshadow with. They (black) handles are easy to hold and use. The bristles are made of animal hair. So, far I haven’t noticed any shedding. Everyone knows that you should change out your brushes every once in a while. So, give these a chance. Did I mention, this set is inexpensive, under $21 on Amazon. Review Title: Time to change out my brushes. Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Besame Cosmetics | Forever Red Lipstick - 1925 | Classic Color Lipstick | Vintage Makeup | Long Lasting Lipstick | Semi Matte Lipstick for Women | Moisturizing Lipstick for Sensitive Skin Review Date: 2022/01/30 Store: BESAME COSMETICS Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'BESAME COSMETICS', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Semi Matte', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Long Lasting,Nourishing,Clean,Moisturizing,Makeup', 'Package Dimensions': '4.45 x 1.14 x 1.06 inches; 0.74 Ounces'} Review Text: Besame classic lipstick (Forever Red 1925) is creamy, moisturizing and conditioning. The color is a bright red, which gives you just the right amount of pop, especially if you are wearing a solid color (like black, blue or grey). I wish it was a deeper red, but regardless I will make it work. It makes my lips feel soft and smooth. It isn’t drying at all. It doesn’t bead on your lips. I wouldn’t consider this a matte finish, but it isn’t really shiny either. It has decent staying power (you can eat or drink while wearing it). Overall, this is a terrific lipstick to put in my rotation. I’d recommend it. Review Title: Potential. Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

Being socially aware of how their products can affect the environment and actively doing something about it is a company that I can support. You can reuse the bottle and add liquid soap or other things. Review Title: Leaves your skin feeling cool and refreshed. Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Fuller Brush Styling Professional Hairbrush - Everyday Hair Styling Tool - Combination Boar and Nylon Bristles Gently Brush Hair while Styling Smoothing and Removing Tangles Dirt Flakes and Oil Review Date: 2020/01/17 Store: Fuller Brush Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Fuller Brush', 'Shape': 'Rectangular', 'Handle Material': 'Plastic', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothing', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '8.98 x 2.6 x 1.81 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '083701005291'} Review Text: Clearly Amazon has mis-priced this brush. $50, for a plastic handled brush and firm bristles? First, I am ok with the plastic handle. It is easy to grip and hold. And since it is plastic, you don’t have to worry about it looking faded after several washes (I do clean mine) like you do with the wooden ones. I’m even ok with the firm bristles (nylon and boar), because I have coarse hair and I’m not tender headed. I like that it smooths the hair easily. What I don’t like is the PRICE. I can’t believe they expect people to pay $49 for this brush. Yikes! And the sad thing is that it didn’t even come in pretty packaging. Just in a simple white box. So, while I am sure I will use this brush, I can’t get over the price. 2 stars Review Title: $50 for a plastic brush? Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: ikoo Deep Caring Hair Mask, Hydrate & Shine, Great for Normal, Dry or Lackluster Hair, All Natural Ingredients, Effectively Hydrates, Moisturizes & Adds Shine - 6.8 Fl Oz Review Date: 2021/07/07 Store: ikoo Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Ikoo', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Material Feature': 'Natural, Cruelty Free, Vegan', 'Hair Type': 'Dry,Normal', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.74 x 3.74 x 3.15 inches; 11.68 Ounces'} Review Text: The Ikoo Infusions hair mask was surprisingly great. It is moisturizing, hydrating and nourishing. This product comes in a round (6.8 oz) container. The thick (light green) cream smells refreshing and bright. Some of the ingredients are macadamia oil, honey extract and camellia oil. It is non-greasy but does leave a slight shine. This product is cruelty, vegan, sulfate and paraffin free (Peta approved since that is important for some consumers). I have coarse, sometimes dry hair, that after using this product made it more manageable after just one treatment. I used it as a deep conditioning treatment. It left my scalp and hair feeling refreshed and clean. I’d recommend it. Review Title: Moisturizing and hydrating. Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Fragrantshare Makeup Brush Set 18pcs Travel Makeup Brushes [Horse Hair Hand Brush] with Blush, Eye Shadow, Eye Liner, Highlighter, Eyebrow, Eyelash, Foundation Brush - Black Review Date: 2021/07/17 Store: FragrantShare Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'FragrantShare', 'Color': 'Black', 'Material': 'Animal Hair', 'Item Form': 'Wand', 'Number of Pieces': '18', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Ferrule Material': 'Aluminum', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '10 x 7 x 1.7 inches; 11.22 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'PRO-18', 'UPC': '633690926659'} Review Text: I like that this set (Fragrantshare) contains a variety of (make-up) brushes. You get 18 brushes in different shapes and sizes. You get everything from a foundation brush, to one that you can apply eyeshadow with. They (black) handles are easy to hold and use. The bristles are made of animal hair. So, far I haven’t noticed any shedding. Everyone knows that you should change out your brushes every once in a while. So, give these a chance. Did I mention, this set is inexpensive, under $21 on Amazon. Review Title: Time to change out my brushes. Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Besame Cosmetics | Forever Red Lipstick - 1925 | Classic Color Lipstick | Vintage Makeup | Long Lasting Lipstick | Semi Matte Lipstick for Women | Moisturizing Lipstick for Sensitive Skin Review Date: 2022/01/30 Store: BESAME COSMETICS Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'BESAME COSMETICS', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Semi Matte', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Long Lasting,Nourishing,Clean,Moisturizing,Makeup', 'Package Dimensions': '4.45 x 1.14 x 1.06 inches; 0.74 Ounces'} Review Text: Besame classic lipstick (Forever Red 1925) is creamy, moisturizing and conditioning. The color is a bright red, which gives you just the right amount of pop, especially if you are wearing a solid color (like black, blue or grey). I wish it was a deeper red, but regardless I will make it work. It makes my lips feel soft and smooth. It isn’t drying at all. It doesn’t bead on your lips. I wouldn’t consider this a matte finish, but it isn’t really shiny either. It has decent staying power (you can eat or drink while wearing it). Overall, this is a terrific lipstick to put in my rotation. I’d recommend it. Review Title: Potential. Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

**Keywords and Trends:**

- **Skincare Focus:** Predominantly purchases skincare products for **brightening**, **anti-aging**, and **cleansing**.
- **Preference for Vitamin C:** Interested in products featuring **vitamin C** for **skin rejuvenation** and brightness.
- **Acne Treatment:** Spent on products that include **salicylic acid** and **tea tree oil**, targeting **acne** and **oil control**.
- **Mask Usage:** Engaged with **peel-off** masks for **deep pore cleansing** and **blackhead removal**, indicating an interest in **purifying treatments**.
- **Hair Care Products:** Actively seeks moisturizing and **hydrating** hair treatments, including masks and brushes, suggesting value on healthy hair management.
- **Makeup Interest:** Purchased **makeup brushes** and **lipsticks**, indicating a penchant for makeup application tools and **classic makeup finishes**.
- **Budget Consciousness:** Frequent mentions of product value; critical of high prices, suggesting a trend toward seeking **affordable skincare** and beauty solutions.
- **Environmental Awareness:** Shows preference for products with **sustainable** packaging and natural ingredients, reflecting a **socially responsible** buying behavior.

Overall, this person's shopping behavior displays a commitment to skin and hair health while balancing efficacy with cost and ethical considerations.

target_interaction.title: Just what I needed!
